The '''Present Age''' was the time period that started in the year [[1000 DR]] and continued to the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description:
The Present Age was considered one of the most tumultuous ages in the history of [[Toril]]. It was a time of constant struggle but also a time of discovery and exploration.

During the first years of the Present Age, [[Faer√ªn]] reestablished trade with [[Kara-Tur]] and [[Zakhara]], and the [[Great Glacier]] began to retreat, uncovering the realms of [[Vaasa]] and [[Damara]]. Later, the continent of [[Maztica]] was discovered by [[Amn]]ians.

In a period of less that one hundred fifty years, the world of Toril was nearly destroyed, shaken to its core.{{Cite web|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eAoq-vwWHHg|title=What is the Sundering? (Part 1)|accessmonthday=September 7th|accessyear=2017|author=[[Ed Greenwood]],  [[Erin M. Evans]], [[Paul S. Kemp]], [[R.A. Salvatore]], [[Richard Lee Byers]], [[Troy Denning]], [[James Wyatt]] |date=August 21th, 2012}} and while its "reunion" with its long lost twin world, [[Abeir]], was brief, its mark on Toril was significant and enduring, [[Tymanther]] and [[Laerakond]].

The Present Age encompassed in the following time periods:
*The Present Age took place during the last three hundred and fifty eight years of the time period known as the [[Age of Humanity]].According to ''[[The Grand History of the Realms]]'' (page 29), the Age of Humanity lasted until the year 1000 DR, however the ''[[Forgotten Realms Campaign Guide]]'' (page 43) states that the Age of Humanity lasted until the year 1358 DR.
*The [[Era of Upheaval]], that started in 1358 DR, and lasted until [[1488 DR]].
*The current age, that started in [[1489 DR]].
